note:
I don't post much, but try to boost and like posts I find interesting. In general I'm a dystopian futurologist and have a bleak outlook on most of humanity's future. The surrealism of our current shared existence is where it's at, this wild ride is interesting!

If I've followed you it's because I find your posts interesting and have come across them in a public timeline.

All posts on this account should be considered satire, unless you like and support what I'm saying.

Bit more in detail about me:

Natural born Norwegian, aspiring strongman and Floridaman. I can already lift a fully-grown horse above my head with one arm, and I can hold my breath for an hour. To settle a wager, I once ate a kilo of Syver's biggest awardwinning weiner sausages and ran two kilometers in the nude. I can not mind the pain, Potter, and I can see for miles unaided by a lens. No man have managed to kill me. Yet. I have beaten a person from each of the continents in formal internet shitposting, including Antarctica. A medical doctor and two priests have written and signed a document confirming that I DO have a soul.
